content: summer breeze tank version e2 january 7 2007 materials needed light worsted weight cotton or cotton blend yarn such as tlc cotton plus or caron simply soft approx 2-4 oz depending on size h hook 4 stitch markers ½ buttons 3 3 4 4 5 5 3/8 ribbon 1-2 yards depending on size or size 3 crochet thread and f hook sewing needle and thread gauge 3 5 sts per inch in half_double_crochet sizes 0-6 months 6-12 months 12-18 months 18-24 months 3t-4t 5t-6t chest row 1 chain 67 71 75 79 83 87 half_double_crochet in the back ridge of 3rd chain from hook and in each chain back loop across 65 69 73 77 81 85 half_double_crochet row 2 chain 3 turn skip 1st half_double_crochet half_double_crochet in next half_double_crochet buttonhole formed and in each half_double_crochet across row 3 chain 2 turn half_double_crochet in 1st half_double_crochet and in each half_double_crochet across half_double_crochet in last st the chain space that formed the buttonhole repeat row 2 and 3 till piece measures approx 2 2 2 5 2 5 3 ¼ 3 ¼ inches from the beginning ending with row 2 last row chain 1 turn single_crochet in each st across and in the chain space that forms the buttonhole finish off place a stitch marker in the suggested single_crochet stitches noted for your size on the last row you just made these will be where you ll place the straps you can also try the tank on your child and place the markers where you would like the straps to be 0-6 11th 24th 42nd 55th 6-12 11th 28th 41st 58th 12-18 9th 26th 42nd 59th 18-24 11th 29th 49th 67th 3t-4t 12th 36th 50th 71st 5t-6t 10th 33rd 52nd 75th may contact patti gonsalves at dandelions2@yahoo com or http \\www dandeliondreamers com for further information page 1 of 1 bottom row 1 join w/ slip_stitch to 1st st of row 1 from above chain 3 counts as 1st double_crochet yo insert hook in same st as chain 3 yo and pull up a loop yo and draw through 2 loops on hook yo skip next st insert hook in next st yo and pull up a loop yo and draw through 2 loops yo and draw through all 3 loops on hook chain 1 work cluster see below across double_crochet in last st same as last cluster cluster stitch you will work this when you see work cluster yo insert hook in the same st as the last st made yo and pull up a loop yo and draw through 2 loops on hook yo skip
